Articles.Content:
Howdy,

I've been doing a lot of video capture of an epic first mission to Duna..... I've started editing it into a series of Music video mission reports(?). Here's the first instalment which documents the 3 launches required for assembly of the Duna Resource Mission

http://youtu.be/PP_TOnMqxTM

Apologies for the game lag stutter in some bits but I just can't help building very complex missions and assets!!!

Enjoy and stay tuned for #2 (Duna Resource Mission assembly and transit)
